acts_as_versioned

This library adds simple versioning to an ActiveRecord module. ActiveRecord is required.

Resources

Install

  • gem install acts_as_versioned

Rubyforge project

  • rubyforge.org/projects/ar-versioned

RDocs

  • ar-versioned.rubyforge.org

Subversion

  • techno-weenie.net/svn/projects/acts_as_versioned

Collaboa

  • collaboa.techno-weenie.net/repository/browse/acts_as_versioned

Special thanks to Dreamer on #rubyonrails for help in early testing. His ServerSideWiki (serversidewiki.com) was the first project to use acts_as_versioned in the wild.
